system.description:
With your mix of raw athleticism, pure combat mastery, and the warrior’s wisdom only experience can bring, you are a unique—and probably legendary—threat on the battlefield, and you are hard to stop. You gain the following benefits:

  • Treat your prestige rating as a point higher than it is (minimum 5) when dealing with soldiers, mercenaries, bodyguards, assassins, and others for whom violence and force of arms are a way of life.

  • If you would acquire the stunned condition, you can spend a point of exertion to be rattled instead. If you would acquire the paralyzed condition, you can spend a point of exertion to be slowed instead. In either case, the duration is the same as the initial condition, or one minute if the initial condition would be permanent.

  • You treat all melee weapons you are proficient with that lack the heavy and/or two-handed properties as adept weapons. You gain the following feature:

    Menacing Kata: While wielding an adept weapon, you can spend an action to perform a display of supreme weapon prowess. Enemies within 30 feet who can see you must make a Wisdom save against your maneuver DC or be rattled for one minute. Creatures that fail their save by more than 5 are frightened instead.
